parameter.description: Enable or disable Call Return capability in the endpoint. This parameter should not be present if the CPE does not support endpoint based Call Return capability.

parameter.name: RepeatDialEnable
parameter.description: Enable or disable Repeat Dial capability in the endpoint. This parameter should not be present if the CPE does not support endpoint based Repeat Dial capability.

object.name: VoiceService.{i}.VoiceProfile.{i}.Line.{i}.VoiceProcessing.
object.description: Voice line parameters related to voice processing capabilities.

parameter.name: TransmitGain
parameter.description: Gain in {{units}} to apply to the transmitted voice signal prior to encoding. This gain is a modifier of the default transmit-gain, which is unspecified.

parameter.name: ReceiveGain
parameter.description: Gain in {{units}} to apply to the received voice signal after decoding. This gain is a modifier of the default receive-gain, which is unspecified.

parameter.name: EchoCancellationEnable
parameter.description: Enable or disable echo cancellation for this line.

parameter.name: EchoCancellationInUse
parameter.description: Indication of whether or not echo cancellation is currently in use for this line.

parameter.name: EchoCancellationTail
parameter.description: Tail length in {{units}} of the echo canceller associated with this line (whether or not it is currently in use).

object.name: VoiceService.{i}.VoiceProfile.{i}.Line.{i}.Codec.
object.description: This object indicates the state of the transmit and receive codec for this voice line instance.

parameter.name: TransmitCodec
parameter.description: The codec currently in use for the outgoing voice stream.

parameter.name: ReceiveCodec
parameter.description: The codec currently in use for the incoming voice stream.

parameter.name: TransmitBitRate
parameter.description: Codec bit rate in {{units}} for the codec currently in use for the outgoing voice stream.

parameter.name: ReceiveBitRate
parameter.description: Codec bit rate in {{units}} for the codec currently in use for the incoming voice stream.

parameter.name: TransmitSilenceSuppression
parameter.description: Whether or not silence suppression is in use for the outgoing voice stream.

parameter.name: ReceiveSilenceSuppression
parameter.description: Whether or not silence suppression is in use for the incoming voice stream.

parameter.name: TransmitPacketizationPeriod
parameter.description: Current outgoing packetization period in {{units}}.

object.name: VoiceService.{i}.VoiceProfile.{i}.Line.{i}.Codec.List.{i}.
object.description: Table to describe the set of codecs enabled for use with this line. Each entry in this table refers to a distinct combination of codec and bit rate. When an instance of {{object|.VoiceProfile.{i}.Line.{i}.}} is created, this object MUST be populated with the set of supported codecs matching {{object|.Capabilities.Codecs.}}. The ACS MAY restrict and/or prioritize the codec support for this profile using this object. Applicable only for a VoIP endpoint.

parameter.name: EntryID
parameter.description: Unique identifier for each entry in this table. The value MUST match that of the corresponding entry in {{object|.Capabilities.Codecs.}} table.

parameter.name: Codec
parameter.description: Identifier of the codec type. The value MUST match that of the corresponding entry in {{object|.Capabilities.Codecs.}}.

parameter.name: BitRate
parameter.description: Bit rate, in {{units}}. The value MUST match that of the corresponding entry in {{object|.Capabilities.Codecs.}}

parameter.name: PacketizationPeriod
parameter.description: {{list}} Each item is a supported packetization period, in milliseconds, or continuous ranges of packetization periods as defined in {{param|.Capabilities.Codecs.{i}.PacketizationPeriod}}. The set of packetization periods may be restricted by modifying the value of this parameter to a more restricted set of values than is listed in {{param|.Capabilities.Codecs.{i}.PacketizationPeriod}}. The CPE MUST ignore any values or portions of ranges outside of those specified in {{param|.Capabilities.Codecs.{i}.PacketizationPeriod}}.

parameter.name: SilenceSuppression
parameter.description: Indicates support for silence suppression for this codec. If silence suppression is supported, it can be disabled for this codec/bit-rate by setting this parameter to {{false}}.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enable or disable the use of this combination of codec parameters.

parameter.name: Priority
parameter.description: Indicates the priority for this combination of codec parameters, where 1 is the highest priority. Where the priority differs between entries in this table, the CPE SHOULD use the highest priority (lowest numbered) entry among those supported by the remote endpoint and consistent with the available bandwidth. Where the priorities are equal among multiple entries, the CPE MAY apply a local criterion for choosing among them.

object.name: VoiceService.{i}.VoiceProfile.{i}.Line.{i}.Session.{i}.
object.description: Information on each active session associated with this voice line instance.

parameter.name: SessionStartTime
parameter.description: The time that the session started, in UTC.

parameter.name: SessionDuration
parameter.description: Duration time of the current session, in seconds.

parameter.name: FarEndIPAddress
parameter.description: The IP address of far end VoIP device.

parameter.name: FarEndUDPPort
parameter.description: The UDP port used for current RTP session in the far end device.

parameter.name: LocalUDPPort
parameter.description: The local UDP port used for current RTP session.

object.name: VoiceService.{i}.VoiceProfile.{i}.Line.{i}.Stats.
object.description: Statistics for this voice line instance.

parameter.name: ResetStatistics
parameter.description: When set to one, resets the statistics for this voice line. Always False when read.

parameter.name: PacketsSent
parameter.description: Total number of RTP packets sent for this line.

parameter.name: PacketsReceived
parameter.description: Total number of RTP packets received for this line.

parameter.name: BytesSent
parameter.description: Total number of RTP payload bytes sent for this line.

parameter.name: BytesReceived
parameter.description: Total number of RTP payload bytes received for this line.

parameter.name: PacketsLost
parameter.description: Total number of RTP packets that have been lost for this line.

parameter.name: Overruns
parameter.description: Total number of times the receive jitter buffer has overrun for this line.

parameter.name: Underruns
parameter.description: Total number of times the receive jitter buffer has underrun for this line.

parameter.name: IncomingCallsReceived
parameter.description: Total incoming calls received.

parameter.name: IncomingCallsAnswered
parameter.description: Total incoming calls answered by the local user.

parameter.name: IncomingCallsConnected
parameter.description: Total incoming calls that successfully completed call setup signaling.

parameter.name: IncomingCallsFailed
parameter.description: Total incoming calls that failed to successfully complete call setup signaling.

parameter.name: OutgoingCallsAttempted
parameter.description: Total outgoing calls attempted.

parameter.name: OutgoingCallsAnswered
parameter.description: Total outgoing calls answered by the called party.

parameter.name: OutgoingCallsConnected
parameter.description: Total outgoing calls that successfully completed call setup signaling.

parameter.name: OutgoingCallsFailed
parameter.description: Total outgoing calls that failed to successfully complete call setup signaling.

parameter.name: CallsDropped
parameter.description: Total calls that were successfully connected (incoming or outgoing), but dropped unexpectedly while in progress without explicit user termination.

parameter.name: TotalCallTime
parameter.description: Cumulative call duration in seconds.

parameter.name: ServerDownTime
parameter.description: The number of seconds the CPE is unable to maintain a connection to the server. SHOULD not include time in which overall network connectivity is unavailable. Applies only to SIP.

parameter.name: ReceivePacketLossRate
parameter.description: Current receive packet loss rate in percent, calculated as defined in {{bibref|RFC3550|Section6.4}}

parameter.name: FarEndPacketLossRate
parameter.description: Current far end receive packet lost rate in percent, calculated as defined in {{bibref|RFC3550|Section6.4}}.

parameter.name: ReceiveInterarrivalJitter
parameter.description: Current receive interarrival jitter in {{units}}. Calculated from J(i) as defined in {{bibref|RFC3550|Section6.4}}, with units converted to {{units}}.

parameter.name: FarEndInterarrivalJitter
parameter.description: Current Interarrival jitter in {{units}} as reported from the far-end device via RTCP. Calculated from J(i) as defined in {{bibref|RFC3550|Section64.}}, with units converted to {{units}}.

parameter.name: RoundTripDelay
parameter.description: Current round trip delay in {{units}} calculated as defined in {{bibref|RFC3550|Section6.4}}.

parameter.name: AverageReceiveInterarrivalJitter
parameter.description: Average receive interarrival jitter in {{units}} since the beginning of the current call. Calculated as the average of D(i,j) as defined in {{bibref|RFC3550|Section6.4}}, with units converted to {{units}}.

parameter.name: AverageFarEndInterarrivalJitter
parameter.description: Average far-end interarrival jitter in {{units}} since the beginning of the current call. Calculated as the average of the interarrival jitter values reported by the far-end, with units converted to {{units}}.

parameter.name: AverageRoundTripDelay
parameter.description: Average round trip delay in {{units}} since the beginning of the current call. Average of the {{param|RoundTripDelay}} statistic accumulated each time the delay is calculated.

object.name: VoiceService.{i}.PhyInterface.{i}.
object.description: Each instance is associated with a distinct physical FXS (Foreign eXchange Station) port. Instances of this object are statically created by the CPE. Applicable only for a VoIP Endpoint.

parameter.name: PhyPort
parameter.description: The physical port number on the device.

parameter.name: InterfaceID
parameter.description: The unique identifier of the physical port. This value MAY be used in {{param|.VoiceProfile.{i}.Line.{i}.PhyReferenceList}} to indicate which physical ports are associated with a line.

parameter.name: Description
parameter.description: A description of the physical port.

object.name: VoiceService.{i}.PhyInterface.{i}.Tests.
object.description: Voice port tests. If this object is supported, {{param|.Capabilities.VoicePortTests}} MUST be equal to {{true}}.

parameter.name: TestState
parameter.description: Indicates the current test state. {{enum}} Value MAY be set to {{enum|Requested}} to initiate a diagnostic test. When writing, the only allowed value is {{enum|Requested}}. To ensure the use of the proper test parameters (the writable parameters in this object), the test parameters MUST be set either prior to or at the same time as (in the same SetParameterValues) setting the value {{enum|Requested}}. When requested, the CPE SHOULD wait until after completion of the communication session with the ACS before starting the test. When the test initiated by the ACS is completed (successfully or not), the CPE MUST establish a new connection to the ACS to allow the ACS to view the results, indicating the Event code "8 DIAGNOSTICS COMPLETE" in the Inform message.

parameter.name: TestSelector
parameter.description: Indicates which test to perform. {{enum}} The phone connectivity test indicates that the CPE should determine if one or more phones associated with this physical port are properly connected. This test is appropriate only for CPE that connect to phones of any type. The parameter MAY instead indicate a vendor-specific test, which MUST use the format defined in {{bibref|TR-106}}. For example: "X_EXAMPLE-COM_MyTest"

parameter.name: PhoneConnectivity
parameter.description: Indicates whether or not at least one phone associated with this physical port is properly connected. This parameter is applicable only if {{enum|PhoneConnectivityTest|TestSelector}} is supported.

object.description: Support for creation and deletion of Profiles is REQUIRED only if more than one Profile is supported as indicated by {{param|.Capabilities.MaxProfileCount}}.
Support for creation and deletion of Lines is REQUIRED only if more than one Line is supported as indicated by {{param|.Capabilities.MaxLineCount}}.

parameter.description: This parameter is REQUIRED to be writable only if there is more than one entry in this table.
This parameter is REQUIRED to be writable only if there is more than one entry in this table.
